Content: <@441961493924282379> Send an email to Mojang with your Transaction ID and/or gift code_ Mojang account email/Minecraft.net email_ and any other relevant information_ through this form: https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/emails/newNLFor wait times on replies refer to https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/359446-when-will-i-hear-back-NLHow to find your Transaction ID: https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/361380
<@441961493924282379> Please ask a person who does speak English to help you write the email_ otherwise they will not understand you.
<@252847503681126400> The owner needs to join and confirm as far as I know.
<@252847503681126400> Current stable version is 1.10
<@543515451809071136> Make sure the password is correct_ try to log in using the same account on your PC on xbox.com.
<@543515451809071136> Please do not ping other people who need help. Follow the instructions I gave you earlier.
<@219935476495286272> Can't join the Realm_ or can't open it after purchase?
<@!443203160845189121> Known Problem_ Mojang_ Microsoft and Nintendo are probably looking into it.
<@219935476495286272> Don't really have much experience with Bedrock Realms_ sorry

<@393120585422471180> Malwarebytes ADWCleaner is an utility to clean a PC which is infested with malware. Download it here: https://toolslib.net/downloads/finish/1/NLRun it_ click Scan Now_ once it completes the scan click Clean & Repair_ restart the computer when it asks you to and come back here for further instructions.
<@393120585422471180> You'd be surprised how many people say that and then that turned out not to be true
<@393120585422471180> That tool is known to help in freezing cases_ try and see if it helps.
<@393120585422471180> If it did get rid of everything_ restart your PC_ then try to run the game.
I've helped about 25 people since.
probably more.
<@536975600821207061> Contact X-Box Account Support.
<@419240985176834048> You may want to ask about that in Discord Support_ this is more focussed on the actual game.

<@304757722786562048> After 3 incorrect login attempts_ a lockout is placed automatically by Mojang's systems on your network to protect accounts against brute force attacks to gain access.NLThis lockout is automatic_ lasts for 1 hour_ and cannot be overridden. Wait 1 hour_ don't log in at all (to *any* account). Then reset your password using https://account.mojang.com/password -- then try again.
<@189346627574562816> Copy the log after the game has crashed.
<@414054901971419139> We will need some kind of crash log.
<@414054901971419139> On a pasting website of your choice_ like paste.ee.
are you quite finished then?
been spamming constantly.
thank you
as always_ terribly sorry.
<@189346627574562816> It's clearly showing in the crash report. Also_ keep in mind that the 635M is getting a bit old now too.

<@304757722786562048> Just give them as many details as possible in your account support request (apart from the password_ don't write that in the email). Previous Username_ previous Email Addresses of the account_ birthday etc._ whatever you think could help to recover your account.
!rank
<@304757722786562048> Explain that to them_ not me.
<@304757722786562048> They will answer_ and ask for whatever information they need to verify you.

<@304757722786562048> Unfortunately_ due to understaffing and unexpected sickness_ the wait time for account support requests is currently longer than normal. Please refer to this page for an approximate wait time: https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/359446-when-w

<@414054901971419139> " To resolve the problem_ 1. you must DELETE all the current items in your mods directory (AppData --> .minecraft --> mods)NLand 2. You must download all the mods you wish to run_ then simply DRAG them over to the mods directory. Do NOT extract your jar files. "
<@414054901971419139> Forgewurst? Isn't that what you use to play the game without having to pay for the game?
<@414054901971419139> Forge does not support Wurst_ please do not use it.
<@414054901971419139> Instead_ only use Forge via the official launcher please.
<@414054901971419139> It is probably the reason_ yes.
<@414054901971419139> Just delete everything_ and start from scratch.
And that's me for today_ goodbye.
